name: default_xor

encode:
Function Encrypt(data)
k="e45e329feb5d925b"
size=len(data)
For i=1 To size
result=result&Chr(asc(mid(data,i,1)) Xor Asc(Mid(k,(i and 15)+1,1)))
Next
Encrypt=result
End Function
name: default_xor
decode:
Function Decrypt(data)
k="e45e329feb5d925b"
size=lenb(data)
For i=1 To size
result=result&Chr(ascb(midb(data,i,1)) Xor Asc(Mid(k,(i and 15)+1,1)))
Next
Decrypt=result
End Function
